subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Cam Talbot made 28 saves, including a spectacular glove grab off a close-in shot from Nicklas Backstrom during a 5-on-3 chance, and the Rangers won at Washington, 3-1.
snippet: Cam Talbot made 28 saves, including a spectacular glove grab off a close-in shot from Nicklas Backstrom during a 5-on-3 chance, and the Rangers won at Washington, 3-1.
